Posts.Content: Jan 21, 2008 03:53PM snowbaby wrote: I had a one-sided mastectomy because I am small breasted and felt that whatever would be left would be unsightly anyway.  That was 8 months ago.  Just 3 days ago I had an expander put in and it was a one day surgery, very easy.   I am so happy I did it.  I talked to several plastic surgeons, and they were all very happy that I did not have radiation, as the skin is much easier to work with.
Posts.Title: Feeling pressured to have lumpectomy instead of mastectomy otter irishdreama
